WCAG20_Html_HasLang.0: Page must identify the default language of the document with a 'lang' attribute

RPT_Html_SkipNav.0: Provide a way to bypass blocks of content that are repeated on multiple Web pages

WCAG20_Doc_HasTitle.0: The page should have a title that correctly identifies the subject of the page

WCAG20_Elem_Lang_Valid.0: The language of content must be specified in accordance with BCP 47

HAAC_BackgroundImg_HasTextOrTitle.0: Background images that convey important information must have a text alternative that describes the image

RPT_List_UseMarkup.0: Use proper HTML list elements to create lists

RPT_Text_SensoryReference.0: Instructions must be meaningful without shape or location words

WCAG20_Text_Emoticons.0: Emoticons must have a short text alternative that describes their purpose

WCAG20_Text_LetterSpacing.0: Use CSS 'letter-spacing' to control spacing within a word

RPT_Blockquote_WrapsTextQuote.0: Quotations should be marked with <q> or <blockquote> elements

IBMA_Color_Contrast_WCAG2AA_PV.0: The contrast ratio of text with its background (i.e. background with a color gradient or a background image) must meet WCAG 2.1 AA requirements

HAAC_Aria_Native_Host_Sematics.0: WAI-ARIA roles and attributes must be valid for the element they are assigned to

Rpt_Aria_OrphanedContent_Native_Host_Sem.0: All content must reside within an element with a landmark role

RPT_Title_Valid.0: Page <title> should be a descriptive title, rather than a filename

WCAG20_Body_FirstASkips_Native_Host_Sema.0: Pages must provide a way to skip directly to the main content

WCAG20_Body_FirstAContainsSkipText_Nativ.0: The description of a hyperlink used to skip content must communicate where it links to

RPT_Block_ShouldBeHeading.0: Heading text must use a heading element

HAAC_Application_Role_Text.0: Non-decorative static text and image content within an element with "application" role must be accessible

Rpt_Aria_ValidRole.0: Elements must have a valid 'role' per WAI-ARIA specification

Rpt_Aria_RequiredChildren_Native_Host_Se.0: An element with a WAI-ARIA role must contain required children

Rpt_Aria_MissingKeyboardHandler.0: Interactive WAI_ARIA UI components must provide keyboard access

RPT_Header_HasContent.0: Heading elements must provide descriptive text

IBMA_Color_Contrast_WCAG2AA.0: The contrast ratio of text with its background must meet WCAG 2.1 AA requirements

RPT_Headers_FewWords.0: Heading elements must not be used for presentation

WCAG20_Img_HasAlt.0: Images must have an 'alt' attribute with a short text alternative if they convey meaning, or 'alt="" if decorative

WCAG20_Img_PresentationImgHasNonNullAlt.0: Image designated as decorative must have 'alt=""

RPT_Img_AltCommonMisuse.0: 'alt' attribute value must be a good inline replacement for the image

RPT_Media_AltBrief.0: Alternative text in 'alt' attribute should be brief (<150 characters)
